revised_title: The Gravitational Stability of the Earth: A Review of A.E.H. Love's Paper
tldr: This paper by A.E.H. Love investigates the gravitational stability of the Earth, focusing on the balance between gravitation and the elasticity of the Earth's material. The author discusses the limitations of the ordinary theory of elasticity and proposes alternative methods to analyze the problem, such as considering the Earth's material as incompressible or using Lord Rayleigh's method to balance internal gravitation.
